phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project structure, configuration, MCP server skeleton, core models, and state persistence. Establishes the foundational infrastructure all subsequent phases build upon.
phases.milestone: Python package installs cleanly, MCP server starts, health endpoint responds, all core models defined, state persistence operational

phases.name: Agent Registry
phases.description: Agent registration, capability declaration, health checking, and dynamic configuration. The orchestrator learns what agents exist and what they can do.
phases.milestone: All 6 ITOM agents registered with capabilities, health checks functional, get_agent_registry and get_agent_status MCP tools operational

phases.name: Task Routing
phases.description: Domain-based routing engine, task execution with timeout/retry, and configurable routing rules. The orchestrator can receive tasks and dispatch them to the right agent.
phases.milestone: route_task MCP tool correctly routes tasks by domain, task execution handles timeouts and retries, routing rules configurable via JSON

phases.name: Workflow Engine
phases.description: Multi-agent workflow definitions, state machine execution engine, checkpoint/resume, and pre-built workflow templates. The orchestrator can coordinate complex multi-agent operations.
phases.milestone: execute_workflow runs multi-step workflows across agents, state machine enforces valid transitions, checkpoint/resume works after failures, 5 pre-built templates available

phases.name: Cross-Agent Communication
phases.description: Inter-agent message passing, event bus for lifecycle events, and agent notification/callback system. Agents can communicate through the orchestrator.
phases.milestone: send_agent_message MCP tool delivers messages between agents, event bus broadcasts lifecycle events, notification system proactively informs agents of relevant events

phases.name: Role Enforcement
phases.description: Role boundary definitions, policy enforcement engine, audit trail, and per-agent boundary configurations. The orchestrator ensures agents only operate within their designated domains.
phases.milestone: enforce_role_boundaries MCP tool validates actions, all 6 agents have defined boundaries, audit log captures all actions with hash chain integrity

phases.name: Testing and Documentation
phases.description: Comprehensive unit tests, integration tests, MCP tool validation, and error handling hardening. Production-quality test coverage and robust error paths.
phases.milestone: 90%+ code coverage, all MCP tools validated, all error paths tested, error handling hardened with clear error codes

tickets.title: Project structure and Python package scaffold
tickets.description: Set up the foundational project structure: pyproject.toml, src/itom_orchestrator/ package, config.py, logging_config.py, error_codes.py, models/ package, tests/ directory, .env.example. Package must be installable with pip install -e .

tickets.title: FastMCP server skeleton with health endpoint
tickets.description: Create the FastMCP server entry point with basic server lifecycle management and the first MCP tool: get_orchestrator_health. Health endpoint returns server uptime, version, connected agents count, active workflows count.

tickets.title: Core Pydantic models for agents, tasks, and workflows
tickets.description: Define all foundational Pydantic models: AgentRegistration, AgentCapability, AgentStatus, Task, TaskResult, WorkflowDefinition, WorkflowStep, WorkflowExecution, AgentMessage, MessageType, and shared types. All models use strict validation.

tickets.title: State persistence layer with JSON file storage
tickets.description: Implement StatePersistence class for saving/loading orchestrator state to JSON files. Supports atomic writes, file locking, auto-directory creation, and state versioning. All state operations go through this layer.

tickets.title: Agent Registry -- registration and capability declaration
tickets.description: Implement AgentRegistry class with register/unregister/lookup/search by capability/domain. Pre-configured definitions for all 6 ITOM agents. Registry persisted via StatePersistence layer.

tickets.title: Agent health checking and status monitoring
tickets.description: Implement AgentHealthChecker class with per-agent and bulk health checks, configurable timeout and TTL caching, health history tracking. Register get_agent_status and get_agent_registry MCP tools.

tickets.title: Agent configuration file and dynamic loading
tickets.description: Create agents.json config file format and implement dynamic loading. Config validated against Pydantic models. Default configs for all 6 ITOM agents. Runtime reload support.

tickets.title: Task Router -- domain-based routing engine
tickets.description: Implement TaskRouter class with domain-based routing, capability matching, agent availability checks, explicit agent targeting, and configurable routing rules. Register route_task MCP tool.

tickets.title: Task execution and result handling
tickets.description: Implement TaskExecutor class for dispatching routed tasks to agents via MCP tool calls. Includes timeout handling, retry with exponential backoff, execution logging, and history. Register get_execution_history MCP tool.

tickets.title: Routing rules configuration and domain mapping
tickets.description: Create routing-rules.json config with domain keyword mappings, capability mappings, priority rules, fallback behavior. Rule validation on load and hot-reload support.

tickets.title: Workflow definition schema and template system
tickets.description: Design and implement WorkflowDefinition and WorkflowStep with input/output mappings, conditional steps, parallel step groups. Register create_workflow and list_workflows MCP tools. Store templates in .itom-orchestrator/workflows/.

tickets.title: Workflow state machine and execution engine
tickets.description: Implement WorkflowEngine with state machine (pending/running/step_executing/step_completed/paused/failed/completed/cancelled), valid transition enforcement, FAIL-STOP, data context accumulation, step-by-step execution. Register execute_workflow and get_workflow_status MCP tools.

tickets.title: Workflow checkpointing and resume from failure
tickets.description: Implement CheckpointManager for saving state after each step, resuming failed workflows from last checkpoint, stale checkpoint detection, and manual step skip. Register cancel_workflow MCP tool.

tickets.title: Pre-built workflow templates for common ITOM scenarios
tickets.description: Create 5 workflow templates: full-discovery-scan, cmdb-audit, asset-reconciliation, incident-remediation, documentation-refresh. Each with proper step definitions, input/output mappings, and validation.

tickets.title: Inter-agent message passing system
tickets.description: Implement MessageBus class for agent-to-agent communication through the orchestrator. Message types: request, response, notification, event, error. Includes queuing, persistence, delivery confirmation. Register send_agent_message MCP tool.

tickets.title: Event bus for workflow and agent lifecycle events
tickets.description: Implement EventBus with subscribe/unsubscribe, event dispatch, event history, and filtering. Event types: workflow_started/completed/failed, step events, agent registration/health changes, task routing, message sent.

tickets.title: Agent notification and callback system
tickets.description: Implement NotificationManager for proactive agent notifications. Types: task_assigned, workflow_step_ready, health_check_request, config_updated, agent_error_report. Retry on failure, dead letter queue, deduplication.

tickets.title: Role boundary definitions and policy engine
tickets.description: Implement RoleEnforcer class with role definitions per agent, enforce/audit/disabled modes, violation logging, and integration into task executor. Register enforce_role_boundaries MCP tool.

tickets.title: Action audit trail and compliance logging
tickets.description: Implement AuditLogger class with JSONL audit log, log rotation, query API, SHA-256 hash chain between entries. Integration into task executor, role enforcer, workflow engine, and message bus.

tickets.title: Role boundary configuration for all ITOM agents
tickets.description: Create detailed role-boundaries.json configs for all 6 agents: cmdb-agent (CMDB read/write), discovery-agent (discovery scans), asset-agent (asset tables), csa-agent (catalog/workflows/requests), itom-auditor (read-only), itom-documentator (read-only). Cross-agent interaction rules.

tickets.title: Unit tests for registry, router, and models
tickets.description: Comprehensive unit tests for Pydantic models, AgentRegistry, TaskRouter, StatePersistence, and configuration. All tests use REAL data (ZERO MOCKS). Minimum 90% coverage for tested modules.

tickets.title: Integration tests for workflow execution end-to-end
tickets.description: Integration tests for workflow execution: multi-step scenarios, step failure with FAIL-STOP, checkpoint/resume, parallel steps, conditional steps, state machine validation, data flow validation.

tickets.title: Integration tests for messaging, events, and role enforcement
tickets.description: Integration tests for MessageBus, EventBus, RoleEnforcer, AuditLogger, NotificationManager. Validates communication and security layers work together.

tickets.title: MCP tool integration tests and server validation
tickets.description: Tests validating all 12 MCP tools are registered, accept correct parameters, return proper responses, and handle errors. Server startup/shutdown tests.

tickets.title: Error handling hardening and edge case coverage
tickets.description: Harden error handling across all components: specific exceptions, error propagation with context, graceful degradation, resource cleanup, input validation, concurrent safety, timeout cascade prevention.
